item.title: A Minimal IPVS Load Balancer demo
item.description: Over the past couple of days I’ve been investigating various load balancing techniques (Layer 4 and Layer 7) for use with Kubernetes’ (K8s) external load balancers. For context: in a well deployed cluster, you will probably use a K8s ingress controller implementation to route traffic to particular apps and services using complex L7 routing rules (like Host headers, cookies-stickiness, etc.
